import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import AdminDashboardForAll from "../AdminDashboardForAll"; import {FaStar, FaBackward, FaArrowDown, FaPlus} from "react-icons/fa"; import axios from "axios"; const AddBook = () =>{ let history = useHistory(); const [books, setBook] = useState({ bk_id :"", bk_title: "", bk_author: "", bk_edition: "", bk_publisher: "", bk_publication_date: "", bk_copies: "", bk_category: "", bk_rackno: "" }); const { bk_id, bk_title, bk_anchor, bk_edition, bk_publisher, bk_publication_date, bk_copies, bk_category, bk_rackno } = books; const inputEvent = (event) =>{ setBook({ ...books, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } const onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/books", books); history.push("/auth/after-auth-admin/admin-dashboard/books"); }; return( <>
Back To List

); } export default AddBook;
